name: Anthony's Journey
description:
A Journey to stop a rebellion leads to a difficult choice and a lesson learned.

This is A demo version I hope to get good responses over it and I will work it out to a full game. The demo is around 20ish minutes and is about 5% of what the full game is going to be.

The control setup is esc to pause

arrow keys to move

and space or enter for action key.
